en: Do you want to sell it?

en: Not enough [FFCC00FF]Coin[-] . Do you want to purchase more?

en: Not enough [33FFDD] {0} [-] . Do you want to purchase more?

en: Do you want to spend [FF00FFFF]{0}[-]   gems to purchase [33FFDD]{1}[-]  ?

tw: 確認花費 [FFCC00FF]{0}[-] 金幣購買 [33FFDD]{1}[-] ？
en: Do you want to spend [FFCC00FF]{0}[-]  coins to purchase [33FFDD]{1}[-]  ?

en: Do you want to spend [FF00FFFF]{0}[-]  gems to draw Cards?

tw: 確認花費 [FFCC00FF]{0}[-] 金幣抽取晶片？
en: Do you want to spend [FF00FFFF]{0}[-]  coins to draw Cards?

tw:
確認解除與[33FFDD] {0} [-]的好友關係？
(一旦解除，就不能在動態上看到對方囉。)
en:
Do you want to unfriend [33FFDD] {0} [-] ?
(You won't be able to see his status on your stream once you unfriend him/her.)

tw: 目前尋找不到對手，請稍候再試。
en: Cannot find opponent now. Please try later.

tw: 每日可購買的次數已達到上限，無法進行挑戰。
en: You have reached daily purchase limit, so you cannot challenge.

tw: 已無挑戰次數，請明日再來。
en: No more challenge times left. Please come again tomorrow.

tw: 技能晶片存放空間不足，確認花費 [FF00FFFF]15[-] 寶石購買 [33FFDD]晶片空間X1[-] ？
en: Not enough Skill Card storage space. Do you want to spend [FF00FFFF]15[-]  gems to purchase [33FFDD]Card Space X1[-]  ?

tw: 競賽中只能控制[FFDD33]自己角色[-]的移動。
en: You can only control [FFDD33]Your Own Character[-]  in the game.

tw: Icon_Perfect=投籃時的節奏點擊點到[FFDD33]Perfect[-]，可增加投籃命中率，[FFDD33]Combo[-]越高增加越多。
en: Icon_Perfect=Your FG% will increase when your shooting rhythm is [FFDD33]Perfect[-] . The more the [FFDD33]Combo[-] , the higher your accuracy.

tw: 越接近[FFDD33]籃下[-]，投籃命中率有越多額外加成。
en: The closer you are to the [FFDD33]Basket[-] , the more extra bonus will be added to your FG%.

tw: 拖曳移動搖桿到極限，即可開啟[FFDD33]加速[-]，可加速至耐力用完為止。
en: Move the console to its extent to activate [FFDD33]Acceleration[-] . You can accelerate until you used up your endurance.

tw: 物品的品質高低分別為『白色<[00b35a]綠色[-]<[33bbff]藍色[-]<[c900ff]紫色[-]<[ff8000]橘色[-]』
en: The quality of items are White<[00b35a]Green[-] <[33bbff]Blue[-] <[c900ff]Purple[-] <[ff8000]Orange[-]

tw: 三種體型的人物球員有自己的能力特色喔！！
en: The 3 player will different body types each have their own ability and features!!

tw: 未來的籃球場，三分線與籃筐的距離是[FFDD33]11公尺[-]喔！！
en: In a future basketball court, the distance between the 3 point line and the basket is [FFDD33]11 meters[-] !!

tw: 未來的籃球場，罰球線與籃筐的距離是[FFDD33]7公尺[-]喔！！
en: In a future basketball court, the distance between the free throw line and the basket is [FFDD33]7 meters[-] !!

tw: 在禁區使用投籃時，如果[FFDD33]灌籃值[-]越高，越容易發動[FFDD33]灌籃[-]唷！！
en: When you are shooting in the paint area, the higher your [FFDD33]Dunk[-]  is, the more easier you can trigger a [FFDD33]Dunk[-] !!

tw: Icon_Gem=這是籃球黑幫世界中價值最高的[FF00FFFF]寶石[-]貨幣，擁有它將可以無往不利，想辦法得到它吧！
en: Icon_Gem=This is the most valuable [FF00FFFF]Gem[-]  currency in the world of Basketball Gang. You can do anything with it, so try to get as much as you can!

tw: Icon_Coin=升級、合成與進化都需要用到[FFCC00FF]金幣[-]，透過比賽將可贏得。
en: Icon_Coin=You will need [FFCC00FF]Coins[-]  for upgrade, synthesis and evolution. You can acquire them by winning games.

tw: Icon_TokenPvp=聯盟幣，可用於商店與對戰獎勵中的消費，加入[33FFDD]聯盟對戰[-]就能得到囉！
en: Icon_TokenPvp=Battle Coins can be used at shops and Game Rewards. Join the [33FFDD]Pick-up Games[-]  to get them!

tw: Icon_TokenSocial=社群幣，可用於商店中的消費，在社群中邀請其他玩家成為好友，並對他們[33FFDD]按讚[-]！
en: Icon_TokenSocial=Social Coins can be used at shops. Invite other players to become your friend in the society and [33FFDD]Like[-]  their status!
This function is not available yet

tw:
伺服器維護中，請稍後再嘗試登入。
(V點擊確認鈕，重新嘗試登入)
(X點擊離開鈕，查詢官方公告)
en:
Server under maintenance. Please login later.
(Press V to confirm and try to login again)
(Press X to quit and check on official announcements)

tw: 無法連線，請確認網路暢通。
en: Unable to connect. Please check your connection.

tw: 網路傳輸失敗，請再傳送一次。
en: Internet connection failure. Please try again.

tw: 資料異常，請再傳送一次。
球員等級達到{0}級，才能使用此功能。
en: This function is available when player level reaches LV{0}.

en: You need to spend [FF00FFFF]{0}[-]  gems to purchase player column.

tw: 網路傳輸失敗，請再傳送一次。
en: Internet connection failure. Please try again.

explain: 體力已滿1，滿體狀態下點擊購買
tw: 體力已滿，先消耗一點吧。
en: Your stamina is full. Use some first.

explain: 體力已滿2，購買完後顯示

tw: 錯誤：使用次數上限值有誤。

en: The material has not completed embedding.
Cannot upgrade due to level limit.

tw: 你的空間值不足以安裝此技能晶片。
en: Not enough COST to install this Skill Card.

tw:
您的資料正送往雲端，除非太陽爆炸，
否則我們將永久為您保存資料。
en: Your data will be send to the cloud. Unless the sun explodes, we will preserve your data forever.

tw: 您的體力已全部恢復，快來打一場球吧。
en: You have fully recovered your strength. Let's have a game of ball.

You can activate this function at LV{0}.
You can activate this function at LV{0}.
You can activate this function at LV{0}.

You can activate this function at LV{0}.
You can activate this function at LV{0}.
You can activate this function at LV{0}.
You can activate this function at LV{0}.

tw: LV{0}時可開啟此功能，獲得第三隻球員
en: You can activate this function at LV{0} and acquire the third player.

tw: LV{0}時可開啟此功能，每日登入可領取獎勵
LV{0}時可開啟此功能，可提升技能品質
en: You can activate this function at LV{0} and enhance skill quality.

tw: LV{0}時可開啟此功能，可提升技能能力
en: You can activate this function at LV{0} and enhance skill ability.

tw: LV{0}時可開啟此功能，可蒐集套卡提升技能能力
en: You can activate this function at LV{0} and collect set cards to enhance skill ability.

tw: LV{0}時可開啟此功能，可蒐集造型套裝提升能力
en: You can activate this function at LV{0} and collect costumes to enhance ability.

tw: LV{0}時可開啟此功能，可增加建築序列
en: You can activate this function at LV{0} and add building sequence.

tw: LV{0}時可開啟此功能，可開啟踢館功能
en: You can activate this function at LV{0} and activate the kick-ass function.

tw: LV{0}時可開啟此功能，可增加金幣收入
en: You can activate this function at LV{0} and increase coins received.

tw: LV{0}時可開啟此功能，可購買優惠物品
en: You can activate this function at LV{0} and can purchase items with discount.

tw: LV{0}時可開啟此功能，加快士氣恢復速度
en: You can activate this function at LV{0} and hasten morale recovery speed.

tw: LV{0}時可開啟此功能，前往參觀其他球員的球館
en: You can activate this function at LV{0} and pay visit to other player's court.

tw: LV{0}時可開啟此功能，可增加進入競賽時的士氣值
en: You can activate this function at LV{0} and enhances morale entering the game.

tw: LV{0}時可開啟此功能，可增加士氣值的上限
en: You can activate this function at LV{0} and increase MAX morale.

tw: 成功解鎖[FFDD33]聯盟對戰[-]功能
成功解鎖[FFDD33]關主挑戰[-]功能
成功解鎖[FFDD33]第三招主動技[-]
en: Successfully unlocked [FFDD33]Third Signature Move Active Skill[-]

tw: 星際摔角界難見的奇才，卻因下級居民的身份只能打假比賽賺取收入。直到某次比賽中失手打敗對方而欠下巨債，家庭破碎。[33FFDD]擁有強壯的體格[-]
en: A rare star wrestling genius. Because he was born as a junior citizen, he earns his revenue by playing fake games. He accidentally defeat his opponent and was left with great debts and a broken family. [33FFDD]Has extremely strong body[-] .

tw: 原為前途光明的高階星際軍官，意外失去右臂並接受改造卻失敗了，而後淪為政治犧牲品，同時人生盡毀。[33FFDD]擁有高超的命中率[-]
en: Was a former high-class imperial officer with a bright future. He lost his right arm in an accident and suffered a failed surgery. Later he was sacrificed due to political disputes, which destroyed his promising career. [33FFDD]Has extremely high FG%[-] .

tw: 貧民窟長大的女孩，為了找尋失蹤的父親，跟照顧年幼的弟妹與母親，身兼多職，在星際酒吧練出敏捷的身手。[33FFDD]擁有靈敏的身手[-]
en: A girl who grew up in the slum. She took many jobs to search for her missing father and to take care of her siblings and mother. Due to her job at Star Bar, she has great agility. [33FFDD]Has great agility[-] .

tw:
潛能取得：
透過等級提升取得[3EBBBCFF]潛能點[-] 
 
注意：
每一屬性需求的[3EBBBCFF]潛能點[-]數量不同，請詳閱各數值下方說明。
en:
Acquire Potentials:
[3EBBBCFF]AP[-] [ff0000](Attribute Points) [-] 
Win [3EBBBCFF]AP[-]  through level promotion. 
 
Attention:
The [3EBBBCFF]AP[-]  needed for each attribute is different. Please inquire on the requirements below.

tw: 花費寶石[FF00FFFF] {0} [-]重置潛能點配置？
en: Do you want to spend gems to [FF00FFFF] {0} [-] Reset Attribute Points Distribution?

tw: 影響投籃出手的命中率
離籃筐越遠，衰減值越高，則外線成功率降低；此數值影響衰減值的高低
en: The further you are from the basket, the higher the decrease rate and will decrease the success rate of perimeter shots. This attribute will effect the number of decrease rate

tw: 影響可衝刺的持續時間，數值越高時間越久
en: Affects dashing times. The higher the number, the longer you can dash.

tw:
1.被對手衝撞時不會倒地的機率
2.AI開啟時，自動發動肘擊的機率
3.增加肘擊的距離與範圍
4.降低防禦灌籃時，被對手撞開的機率
en:
1.Probability of not falling down when being bumped by opponent.
2.Automatic elbow probability when you activate AI.
3.Increases the distance and range of elbowing.
4.Decrease  falling down probability when you defense dunk.

tw:
1.在禁區內發動灌籃的機率
2.發動補籃的機率
3.AI開啟時，自動發動Alley-oops灌籃的機率
en:
1.Probability of triggering a dunk in the painted area.
2.Probability of triggering tip-in.
3.Probabiliy of automatically triggering alley-oops dunks when AI is activated.

tw:
1.可發動籃板的距離
2.提高發動籃板時抓到球的機會
en:
1.The distance of triggering rebound.
2.Enahnces the chances of grabbing the ball when triggering rebound.

tw:
1.提高蓋到火鍋的機會
2.AI開啟時，自動發動蓋火鍋的機率
3.AI開啟時，影響被對手投籃假動作騙的機率
4.提高蓋到灌籃火鍋的機會
en:
1.Enahnces the chances of blocking a shot.
2.Probability of automatically blocking shots when AI is activated.
3.Probability of being tricked by opponent's pump fake when AI is activated.
4.Probability of bumping opponent after blocking shots.

tw:
1.球員區域防守的範圍
2.AI開啟時，自動發動推人的機率
3.增加推人的距離與範圍
en:
1.Player's defensive range when using zone defense.
2.Probability of automatically triggering push when AI is activated.
3.Enhances the distance and range of push.

tw:
1.影響發動抄截時的成功機率
2.AI開啟時，自動發動抄截的機率
3.增加抄截的距離與範圍
en:
1.Affects the successful rate of steal.
2.Probability of automatically triggering steal when AI is activated.
3.Enahnces the distance and range of steal.

tw: 影響被對手抄截成功的機率，數值越高，對手成功率越低
en: Affects the probability of the ball being stolen. The higher the number, the lower the opponent's rate of success.

tw:
1.影響傳球成功的機率
2.AI開啟時，自動發動alley-oops妙傳的機率
en:
1.Affects success rate of passing.
2.Probability of automatically triggering an alley-oops pass when AI is activated.

explain: 修改名稱會消費的寶石金額

en: The name should be 2-16 letters long

tw: 名稱中含非法字元，請重新命名。
字元長度：中文8字，英文16字。
名稱已被使用，請重新命名。

en: You need you spend gems to immediately refresh shops.

en: The recommendation list with be refreshed daily at 9:00, or you can refresh immediately.

en: Please give yourself a name first so others know who you are.

en: If they follow you they will become friends.

tw: －選擇相同晶片系列進行合成－
en: ─ Conduct synthesis after selecting the same series cards ─

tw: 需要[00ff00]相同的技能晶片[-]，或是[00ff00]『我愛籃球黑幫』[-]才能進行合成。
en: Need same Skill Cards to Upgrade.

explain: 技能晶片安裝後的狀態
技能合成界面顯示該卡EXP

en: Skill Card Star Level is not full.
Skill Card has reached its highest level.

tw:
1.收集完成[00ff00]指定的三張晶片卡[-]後方可啟動。單一晶片卡無法啟動套卡功能唷！
2.累積三張晶片卡的[00ff00]星星總數[-]，可以獲得更佳的屬性加成！
3.按下[00ff00]啟動[-]即可運行套卡功能，再點擊關閉套卡。注意[FF0000FF]啟動上限值[-]。
en:
1. Find the same series of Skill Cards and combine them.
2. After you have completed the collection, press [33FFDD]Activate[-]  to get combination bonus effects. Press again to close the window.
3. Take notice of your [33FFDD]Activate Number Limit[-] .

explain: 啟動按鈕 未啟動狀態
啟動按鈕 啟動狀態
啟動按鈕 未收集完成

tw: 晶片組合尚未收集完成。
en: Yet to gather the whole Card collection
Exceeding activate number limit. Cannot activate.

tw:
收集左列造型，且同時擁有上列技能晶片，即能降低晶片空間，每[33FFDD] 2 [-] 件即降低 [33FFDD] 1 [-] 空間，以此類推。

目前已降低 [00ff00] {0} [-] 空間。
en:
Collect the costumes on the left and own the Skill Cards on top to save Card COST.  [33FFDD] 1 [-]  COST can be saved for every [33FFDD] 2 [-]  items and so on.

[00ff00] {0} [-]  COST saved so far.

tw: 收集同系列造型套裝，擁有 2 件以上即可開啟加成效果，收集越多加成越多！
en: Collect costumes with the same costumes. Owning 2 costumes with the same style to activate bonus effect. The more you collect, the better the bonus effects are!
